oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fisk University Race Relations Conference, circa 1945
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of conference participants posed together at the Race Relations Conference at Talley Hall, Fisk University. Fisk began hosting the annual Race Relations Institute in 1944. Organized by Dr. Charles S. Johnson, head of Fisk's sociology department, the integrated workshops and seminars focused on social problems of racial discrimination and promoted solutions leading to equal opportunity. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fisk University. Race Relations Institute; Talley Hall (Fisk University)
